content.html: The way my productivity plummets whenever I use macOS is wild. It's like splashing around in a colorful pile of mud and "we know what you want, stop thinking otherwise" land. Frustrated that tech's more-or-less forced people to use it (most of the time) for development, despite the complete opposite powering where it lands.
